description:
*************************************************************** ATTENTION!! If your coupon doesnâ€™t work please PM me to get a new one. Thank you! ***************************************************************

Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) is tricky. You can't literally see it or feel it, though we can certainly feel the effects of it.

People often assume that you or your loved one are just naughty or immature or worse.

I know it can be embarrassing to live with, both for myself and my son.

In this course I share both the medical, psychological and person knowledge that I have picked up thought studying the condition as well as living with it. Just some the things you will learn are:

  • You will learn how the condition what 'discovered'
  • Some of the alternative views regarding ADHD
  • What is Methylphenidate (Ritalin)

Above all, became more empowered when dealing with 'professionals', teachers, and people who have no idea why you or your loved one just cant keep still!
title: ADHD Empowerment: A Rough Guide
